item.description:
COME NETWORK WITH US!!

Our favorite meeting of the year is here!  The Bi Annual Networking Party is a great time to come meet the NEREIA group members and see what this group is all about.  Bring your business cards and get ready to work your business and have fun!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This event is always a blast and features:

-Cash Bar

-Best Networking of the Year

-FREE for guests....so bring a friend!

-Networking Games

-Raffle with Prizes

 

More information at: www.newenglandreia.com


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month...THIS MONTH IT IS Tuesday the 10th because of July 4th
Admission Fees

Guests: FREE THIS MONTH!! (Normally $20 at the door)


Ask about getting YOUR membership today!

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: NEREIA's BI-Annual Networking Party!! CHANGED DATE!!
